Room.Name: Archery Range
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the archery field where the elves learn to develop their skills in bows and archery. There are targets to the west and south.
Room.LongDescription: A large mesh prevents anyone from entering the range itself, as absolutely no one is allowed in, for obvious reasons. Unfortunately, the mesh is wide enough that an arrow can easily go through it. There are circular targets about 50 meters to the west, and another set perhaps 25 meters south. Elena's tackle shop is through the door.
